content:
Over the past day, on March 12, 387 invaders were eliminated in the Tavriya direction and destroyed 45 units of enemy equipment.

About thisinformsjoint press center of the Defense Forces of the Tavriya direction.

"The total losses of the enemy in weapons and military equipment last day amounted to 45 units without UAV," the statement said.

Yes, among the reduced Russian technology:

  • 2 tanks,
  • 10 IBM,
  • 12 artisty,
  • 1 RSZV,
  • 1 LNG (AGS),
  • 16 cars,
  • 3 units of special equipment.

"The Defense Forces of Ukraine destroyed 1 ammunition and 5 more important enemy objects," the military added.

Also, 297 UAVs of various types were neutralized or destroyed over the past day.

As reportedАрміяInform, missile troops inflicted lesions of the ammunition and enemy air defense.
title: 45 units of Russian equipment destroyed in the Tavriysk direction per day
description: About it reports the Joint Press Center of Defense Forces of Tavriysk direction. “General ...
author: Army Inform
